title: "Global Bot Services Market Thrives with US$ 1.2 Billion in 2021, Poised for 18% Growth by 2032"
excerpt: "The global bot services market stands at US$ 1.6 Bn at present and is expected to reach US$ 18 Bn by the year 2032 at a whopping CAGR of 27.1% between 2022 and 2032. The e-Commerce and BFSI sectors are more into usage of chatbots."
